name: Pumpkin Protein Cookie Dough
description: No-Bake Edible Cookie Dough with Pumpkin Spice
ingredients: 1/2 cup unflavored or vanilla protein powder
1 tsp cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice
1/4 cup PB2 mixed with water to form paste
instructions: In a large bowl, combine almond flour, protein powder, cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice, and salt
Mix PB2 with water to form a paste consistency
Add pumpkin puree, vanilla extract, PB2 paste, and maple syrup to dry ingredients
Mix thoroughly until well combined and cookie dough consistency forms
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to firm up
Scoop and enjoy or roll into balls for portioned servings
Store in refrigerator for up to 1 week
